snippet: A crowd of more than 200, mostly from two union locals, cheered at a rally Monday amid hopes that the city comptroller, John C. Liu, will still run for mayor.
abstract: Crowd of more than 200 people, mostly from two union locals, cheer at a rally hoping that city comptroller John C Liu will still run for mayor, despite federal investigation into his fund-raising practices; two-hour rally is the most public and vigorous event held for his benefit since his political career was upended.
lead_paragraph: A crowd of more than 200, mostly from two union locals, cheered at a rally Monday amid hopes that the city comptroller, John C. Liu, will still run for mayor.

headline.seo: Liu Supporters Rally, Despite Inquiry on Fund-Raising
headline.main: Cheers for the Comptroller Despite a Federal Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Cheers for the Comptroller Despite a Federal Inquiry
